mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_SELLER, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_SORT, PRODUCT_DESC, PRODUCT_IMAGES, PRODUCT_CREDATE, PRODUCT_COMMENTS, PRODUCT_VIEWS, PRODUCT_LIKES ) VALUES ( #{productName}, #{productSeller}, #{productPrice}, #{productSort}, #{productDesc}, #{productImages}, NOW(), 0, 0, 0 );
mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_NAME, M.MEMBER_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_SORT, P.PRODUCT_DESC, P.PRODUCT_IMAGES, P.PRODUCT_CREDATE, P.PRODUCT_COMMENTS, P.PRODUCT_VIEWS, P.PRODUCT_LIKES FROM T_PRODUCT AS P INNER JOIN T_MEMBER AS M ON P.PRODUCT_SELLER = M.MEMBER_ID;

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NAME, M.MEMBER_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_SORT, P.PRODUCT_DESC, P.PRODUCT_IMAGES, P.PRODUCT_CREDATE, P.PRODUCT_COMMENTS, P.PRODUCT_VIEWS, P.PRODUCT_LIKES FROM T_PRODUCT AS P INNER JOIN T_MEMBER AS M ON P.PRODUCT_SELLER = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE PRODUCT_SORT = #{category};
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_VIEWS = PRODUCT_VIEWS + 1 WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{num};
UPDATE T_PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_COMMENTS = PRODUCT_COMMENTS + 1 WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
